text:
IV
DESCRIPTION OF CHARACTERS
PIERRE PATELIN (PATHELIN)
the lawyer, tall, lean, cleanÂ¬
shaven, lantern-jawed, aged about
forty-five.
JACQUES BEAUMARCHAND
the draper, clean-shaven, with a
round stolid face, a short and
graceless figure, aged about thirty-
five .
TIBALT LAMBKIN
the shepherd, stubble-bearded,
stupid, unimposing stature, hair
long and unkempt, sunburnt, aged
about eighteen.
THE JUDGE
...pompous, bearded, aged between
forty and fifty.
GUILLEMETTE
wife of Pierre Patelin, aged about
thirty.
